title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 342 - Arbitration Of Disputed Podiatry Bills
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 342 - Arbitration Of Disputed Podiatry Bills

State Regulations
§ 342.1 - Definitions
§ 342.2 - Notice of objection to bill and podiatrist's decision regarding arbitration
§ 342.3 - Date of hearing
§ 342.4 - Withdrawal of objection; settlement
§ 342.5 - Composition of arbitration committee
§ 342.6 - Oaths, record of proceedings
§ 342.7 - Conduct of hearing
§ 342.8 - Decision
§ 342.9 - Payment of fees and award
§ 342.10 - Filing of notices

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 342

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13-a[3], 13-g, 13-k, 117, 141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
